format: A data frame with 150 observations on the following 14 variables.

parameters.smoke: Whether or not the mother was a smoker.
parameters.weeks: Weeks at which the mother gave birth.
parameters.premature: Indicates whether the baby was premature or not.

description:
Description
Data on a random sample of 100 births for babies in North Carolina where the
mother was not a smoker and another 50 where the mother was a smoker.
title: North Carolina births, 100 cases
reference: Birth records released by North Carolina in 2004.
